docs.lead_paragraph: The funeral of Detective Joseph Guarnieri, who was shot to death on Thursday night while attempting to arrest William Horgan in a flat at 1,880 Second Avenue, will be held on Monday morning at 10 o'clock at St. Anthony's Church in Sullivan Street, near Houston. Arrangements were made yesterday at Police Headquarters to pay tribute to the man who gave up his life in the performance of his duty.

headline.main: SLAIN DETECTIVE HONORED BY CITY; Commissioner McKay Orders Police Flags at Half-Mast for Joseph Guarnieri.

docs.abstract: buys a Summer home at Bay Shore, L. I.
